channel.title: Cant get in onto Mopar on web
channel.description:
Hi I can't get onto the game on the internet. All I want to do is go on a private server with other people... It just comes up with a white screen when I try to play.... Also the downloaded client doesn't let me put in Server IP's so I can't get into any other servers that way!!
All I want to do is play the game!! I thought it was meant to be *easier* than runescape not harder.... :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Cant get in onto Mopar on web
item.dc:creator: @mopars0wn mopars0wn
item.description:
@mopars0wn wrote:

Thanks Orca, I’m on a Mac Computer so most the downloadable clients don’t work anyway… Like everything else.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get in onto Mopar on web

item.title: Cant get in onto Mopar on web
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

The people who release theyre servers always have a personal downloadable client that is fit for theyre server. On each page you should see a client download, download that one and it is already set up for the server, all you have to do it put in any username or password.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get in onto Mopar on web

item.title: Cant get in onto Mopar on web
item.dc:creator: @mopars0wn mopars0wn
item.description:
@mopars0wn wrote:

Thanks for that, but it just comes up with a white screen…

Now I’m having a bigger problem with the client… It comes up with the
“Error: T2 - 65,81,73 - 15,3287,3366 - 0,1,-71,-21,2,-68,9,-95,-127,-32,-1,-1,-1,0,0,”

I can’t even make a user!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get in onto Mopar on web

item.title: Cant get in onto Mopar on web
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

The mopar client is for customizing your own server. If you would liek to play others, go to the serverstatus page and use the client there. They somtimes have a webclient, or a downloadable desktop client. Hope this helped!

Read full topic
